   20: 
   21: -module(trace_session_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -export([all/0, suite/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   24: 
   25: -export([test_set_on_spawn/1,
   26:          test_set_on_first_spawn/1,
   27:          test_set_on_link/1,
   28:          test_set_on_first_link/1,
   29:          on_load/1,
   30:          trace_info_on_load/1,
   31:          procs/1,
   32:          basic/1,
   33:          call/1,
   34:          meta/1,
   35:          destroy/1,
   36:          negative/1,
   37:          error_info/1,
   38:          end_of_list/1]).
   39: 
   40: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   41: 
   42: 
   43: -undef(line).
   44: -ifdef(debug).
   45: -define(line,io:format("line ~p\n",[?LINE]),erlang:display(?LINE)).
   46: -else.
   47: -define(line,void).
   48: -endif.
   49: 
   50: -export([foo/0, exported/1]).
   51: 
   52: suite() ->
   53:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   54:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   55: 
   56: all() ->
   57:     [
   58:      basic,
   59:      call,
   60:      meta,
   61:      on_load,
   62:      trace_info_on_load,
   63:      procs,
   64:      test_set_on_spawn,
   65:      test_set_on_first_spawn,
   66:      test_set_on_link,
   67:      test_set_on_first_link,
   68:      destroy,
   69:      negative,
   70:      error_info,
   71:      end_of_list].
   72: 
   73: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   74:     Was = erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
   75:     [{available_internal_state, Was} | Config].
   76: 
   77: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   78:     case proplists:get_value(available_internal_state, Config) of
   79:         false ->
   80:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false);
   81:         true ->
   82:             ignore
   83:     end.
   84: 
   85: erlang_trace(legacy, Pid, How, FlagList) ->
   86:     erlang:trace(Pid, How, FlagList);
   87: erlang_trace(Session, Pid, How, FlagList) when is_pid(Pid) ->
   88:     trace:process(Session, Pid, How, FlagList).
   89: 
   90: erlang_trace_pattern(legacy, MFA, MS, FlagList) ->
   91:     erlang:trace_pattern(MFA, MS, FlagList);
   92: erlang_trace_pattern(Session, MFA, MS, FlagList0) ->
   93:     FlagList1 = lists:keydelete(tracer, 1, FlagList0),
   94:     FlagList3 = case lists:keytake(meta, 1, FlagList1) of
   95:                     {value, {meta,_Tracer}, FlagList2} ->
   96:                         [meta | FlagList2];
   97:                     false ->
   98:                         FlagList1
   99:                 end,
  100:     trace:function(Session, MFA, MS, FlagList3).
  101: 
  102: 
  103: on_load(_Config) ->
  104:     Tester= self(),
  105:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  106:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  107:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  108:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  109:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  110:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  111: 
  112:     catch erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  113:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  114:     catch erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  115: 
  116:     on_load1(S1, Tracer1),
  117:     on_load2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  118:              S2, Tracer2, []),
  119:     on_load2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  120:              S2, Tracer2, []),
  121:     on_load2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  122:              legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  123: 
  124:     on_load2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  125:              S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  126:     on_load2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  127:              S1, Tracer1, []),
  128: 
  129:     ok.
  130: 
  131: trace_info_on_load(_Config) ->
  132:     Tester = self(),
  133:     Tracer = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer", Tester) end),
  134:     S = trace:session_create(?MODULE, Tracer, []),
  135:     1 = trace:process(S, self(), true, [call]),
  136:     0 = trace:function(S, on_load, true, []),
  137:     {all,[{traced,global},
  138:       {match_spec,[]},
  139:       {meta,false},
  140:       {meta_match_spec,false},
  141:       {call_count,false}]} = trace:info(S, on_load, all),
  142:     ok.
  143: 
  144: on_load1(Session, Tracer) ->
  145:     Tracee = self(),
  146:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [call]),
  147:     0 = trace:function(Session, on_load, true, []),
  148:     dummy:module_info(),
  149:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  150:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  151:     ?line,
  152:     {Tracer, {trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}} = receive_any(),
  153:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [call]),
  154:     dummy:module_info(),
  155:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  156:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  157:     ?line,
  158:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  159:     0 = trace:function(Session, on_load, false, []),
  160:     ok.
  161: on_load2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  162:     Tracee = self(),
  163:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [call|Opts1]),
  164:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [call|Opts2]),
  165:     Opts1_1 = proplists:delete(tracer, Opts1),
  166:     Opts2_1 = proplists:delete(tracer, Opts2),
  167:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, on_load, true, Opts1_1),
  168:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, on_load, true, Opts2_1),
  169:     dummy:module_info(),
  170:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  171:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  172:     ?line,
  173:     receive_unsorted(
  174:         [{Tracer1,{trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}},
  175:          {Tracer2,{trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}}]),
  176:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [call|Opts1]),
  177:     dummy:module_info(),
  178:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  179:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  180:     ?line,
  181:     {Tracer2, {trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}} = receive_any(),
  182:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [call|Opts2]),
  183:     dummy:module_info(),
  184:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  185:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  186:     ?line,
  187:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  188: 
  189:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, on_load, false, Opts1_1),
  190:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, on_load, false, Opts2_1),
  191:     ok.
  192: 
  193: test_set_on_spawn(_Config) ->
  194:     Tester= self(),
  195:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  196:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  197:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  198:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  199:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  200:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  201: 
  202:     set_on_spawn(S1, Tracer1),
  203:     set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  204:                   S2, Tracer2, []),
  205:     set_on_spawn2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  206:                   S2, Tracer2, []),
  207:     set_on_spawn2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  208:                   legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  209: 
  210:     set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  211:                   S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  212:     set_on_spawn2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  213:                   S1, Tracer1, []),
  214: 
  215:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  216:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  217:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  218: 
  219:     unlink(Tracer0),
  220:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  221:     unlink(Tracer1),
  222:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  223:     unlink(Tracer2),
  224:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  225:     ok.
  226: test_set_on_first_spawn(_Config) ->
  227:     Tester= self(),
  228:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  229:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  230:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  231:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  232:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  233:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  234: 
  235:     set_on_first_spawn(S1, Tracer1),
  236:     set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  237:                         S2, Tracer2, []),
  238:     set_on_first_spawn2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  239:                         S2, Tracer2, []),
  240:     set_on_first_spawn2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  241:                         legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  242: 
  243:     set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  244:                         S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  245:     set_on_first_spawn2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  246:                         S1, Tracer1, []),
  247: 
  248:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  249:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  250:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  251: 
  252:     unlink(Tracer0),
  253:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  254:     unlink(Tracer1),
  255:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  256:     unlink(Tracer2),
  257:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  258:     ok.
  259: test_set_on_link(_Config) ->
  260:     Tester= self(),
  261:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  262:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  263:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  264:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  265:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  266:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  267: 
  268:     set_on_link(S1, Tracer1),
  269:     set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  270:                  S2, Tracer2, []),
  271:     set_on_link2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  272:                  S2, Tracer2, []),
  273:     set_on_link2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  274:                  legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  275: 
  276:     set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  277:                  S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  278:     set_on_link2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  279:                  S1, Tracer1, []),
  280:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  281:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  282:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  283: 
  284:     unlink(Tracer0),
  285:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  286:     unlink(Tracer1),
  287:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  288:     unlink(Tracer2),
  289:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  290:     ok.
  291: 
  292: test_set_on_first_link(_Config) ->
  293:     Tester= self(),
  294:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  295:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  296:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  297:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  298:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  299:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  300: 
  301:     set_on_first_link(S1, Tracer1),
  302:     set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  303:                        S2, Tracer2, []),
  304:     set_on_first_link2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  305:                        S2, Tracer2, []),
  306:     set_on_first_link2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  307:                        legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  308: 
  309:     set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  310:                        S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  311:     set_on_first_link2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  312:                        S1, Tracer1, []),
  313:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  314:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  315:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  316: 
  317:     unlink(Tracer0),
  318:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  319:     unlink(Tracer1),
  320:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  321:     unlink(Tracer2),
  322:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  323:     ok.
  324: set_on_spawn(Session, Tracer) ->
  325:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn]),
  326:     Tracee = self(),
  327:     Child = spawn(fun F() ->
  328:                           receive hej ->
  329:                                   Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  330:                                   exit(Pid, die),
  331:                                   Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  332:                                   F()
  333:                           end
  334:                   end),
  335:     Child ! hej,
  336:     receive {done, GrandChild} -> ok end,
  337:     exit(Child, die),
  338:     receive_parallel(
  339:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  340: 
  341:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child, spawned, Tracee,'_'}},
  342:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  343:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  344: 
  345:        [{Tracer,{trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child,'_'}},
  346:         {Tracer,{trace, GrandChild, exit, die}}]
  347:       }),
  348:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn]),
  349:     ok.
  350: 
  351: set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  352:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  353:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  354:     Tracee = self(),
  355:     Child = spawn(fun F() ->
  356:                           receive hej ->
  357:                                   Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  358:                                   exit(Pid, die),
  359:                                   Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  360:                                   F()
  361:                           end
  362:                   end),
  363:     Child ! hej,
  364:     receive {done, GrandChild} -> ok end,
  365:     exit(Child, die),
  366:     receive_parallel(
  367:       {[{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  368: 
  369:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  370: 
  371:        [{Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  372:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  373:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  374: 
  375:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee,'_'}},
  376:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  377:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  378: 
  379:        [{Tracer1, {trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child, '_'}},
  380:         {Tracer1, {trace, GrandChild, exit, die}}],
  381: 
  382:        [{Tracer2, {trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child, '_'}},
  383:         {Tracer2,{trace, '_', exit, die}}]
  384:       }),
  385: 
  386:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  387: 
  388:     Child1 = spawn(fun F() ->
  389:                            receive hej ->
  390:                                    Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  391:                                    exit(Pid, die),
  392:                                    Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  393:                                    F()
  394:                            end
  395:                    end),
  396:     Child1 ! hej,
  397:     receive {done, GrandChild1} -> ok end,
  398:     exit(Child1, die),
  399:     receive_parallel(
  400:       {[{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child1,'_'}}],
  401: 
  402:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  403:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawn, GrandChild1, '_'}},
  404:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, exit, die}}],
  405: 
  406:        [{Tracer2,{trace, GrandChild1, spawned, Child1,'_'}},
  407:         {Tracer2,{trace, GrandChild1, exit, die}}]
  408:       }),
  409: 
  410:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  411:     ok.
  412: 
  413: set_on_first_spawn(Session, Tracer) ->
  414:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn]),
  415:     Tracee = self(),
  416:     TraceeChild = spawn(fun F() ->
  417:                                 receive hej ->
  418:                                         Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  419:                                         Tracee ! spawned,
  420:                                         exit(Pid, die),
  421:                                         F()
  422:                                 end
  423:                         end),
  424:     TraceeChild ! hej,
  425:     receive spawned -> ok end,
  426:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  427:     TraceeChild1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  428:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  429:     receive_parallel(
  430:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  431:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  432: 
  433:        [{Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  434:         {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  435:         {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}]}),
  436: 
  437:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn]),
  438:     ok.
  439: set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  440:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts1]),
  441:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts2]),
  442:     Tracee = self(),
  443:     TraceeChild = spawn(fun F() ->
  444:                                 receive hej ->
  445:                                         Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  446:                                         exit(Pid, die),
  447:                                         Tracee ! done,
  448:                                         F()
  449:                                 end
  450:                         end),
  451:     TraceeChild ! hej,
  452:     receive done -> ok end,
  453:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  454:     TraceeChild1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  455:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  456:     receive_parallel(
  457:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  458:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  459: 
  460:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  461:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  462: 
  463:        [{Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  464:         {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  465:         {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}],
  466: 
  467:        [{Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  468:         {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  469:         {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}]
  470:       }),
  471: 
  472:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts1]),
  473:     TraceeChild2 = spawn(fun F() ->
  474:                                  receive hej ->
  475:                                          Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  476:                                          exit(Pid, die),
  477:                                          F()
  478:                                  end
  479:                          end),
  480:     TraceeChild2 ! hej,
  481:     exit(TraceeChild2, die),
  482:     TraceeChild21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  483:     exit(TraceeChild21, die),
  484: 
  485:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild2,_}} = receive_any(),
  486:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild21,_}} = receive_any(),
  487:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts2]),
  488:     ok.
  489: 
  490: set_on_link(Session, Tracer) ->
  491:     %% Test set_on_link via spawn_link/1
  492:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link]),
  493:     Tracee = self(),
  494:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  495:     unlink(Child),
  496:     exit(Child, die),
  497:     receive_parallel(
  498:       {[{Tracer, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}},
  499:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  500:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  501: 
  502:        [{Tracer, {trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  503:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  504:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  505:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  506:       }),
  507: 
  508:     %% Test set_on_link via link/1
  509:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  510:     link(Child2),
  511:     unlink(Child2),
  512:     exit(Child2, die),
  513:     receive_parallel(
  514:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  515:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  516:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}}],
  517: 
  518:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  519:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  520:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  521:        }),
  522: 
  523:     %% Test that you can disable the tracer but still get traces
  524:     %% from child process
  525:     Child3 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  526:     link(Child3),
  527:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  528:     unlink(Child3),
  529:     exit(Child3, die),
  530:     receive_parallel(
  531:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn, Child3,'_'}},
  532:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child3}}],
  533: 
  534:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  535:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  536:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, exit, die}}]
  537:       }),
  538: 
  539:     %% Test that you can disable the tracer for the child process
  540:     %% and get messages from the parent
  541:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link]),
  542:     Child4 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  543:     link(Child4),
  544:     receive_parallel(
  545:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child4,'_'}},
  546:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child4}}],
  547: 
  548:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child4, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  549:       }),
  550:     1 = trace:process(Session, Child4, false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  551:     unlink(Child4),
  552:     exit(Child4, die),
  553:     {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child4}} = receive_any(),
  554: 
  555:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  556:     spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  557:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  558:     ok.
  559: set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  560:     %% Test multiple tracers with set_on_link via spawn_link/1
  561:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  562:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts2]),
  563:     Tracee = self(),
  564:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  565:     unlink(Child),
  566:     exit(Child, die),
  567: 
  568:     receive_parallel(
  569:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  570:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  571:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  572: 
  573:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  574:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  575:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  576: 
  577:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  578:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  579:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  580:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  581: 
  582:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  583:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  584:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  585:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  586:       }),
  587: 
  588:     %% Test multiple tracers with set_on_link via link/1
  589:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  590:     ?line,
  591:     link(Child1),
  592:     unlink(Child1),
  593:     exit(Child1, die),
  594: 
  595:     receive_parallel(
  596:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  597:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  598:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  599: 
  600:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  601:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  602:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  603: 
  604:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  605:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  606:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child1, exit, die}}],
  607: 
  608:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  609:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  610:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child1, exit, die}}]
  611:       }),
  612: 
  613:     %% Disable one tracer and test that set_on_link still works for the other tracer
  614:     %% via spawn_link/1
  615:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  616:     Child2 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  617:     unlink(Child2),
  618:     exit(Child2, die),
  619:     receive_parallel(
  620:       {[{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  621:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  622:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}}],
  623: 
  624:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child2, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  625:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  626:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  627:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  628:       }),
  629:     %% Test with link/1
  630:     Child21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  631:     link(Child21),
  632:     unlink(Child21),
  633:     exit(Child21, die),
  634:     receive_parallel(
  635:       {[{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,'_'}},
  636:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}},
  637:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}}],
  638: 
  639:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child21, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  640:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child21, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  641:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child21, exit, die}}]
  642:       }),
  643:     %% Test that you can disable one of the tracers on the child process
  644:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  645:     Child11 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  646:     link(Child11),
  647:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Child11, false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  648:     receive_parallel(
  649:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child11,'_'}},
  650:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child11}}],
  651: 
  652:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child11,'_'}},
  653:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child11}}],
  654: 
  655:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child11, getting_linked, Tracee}}],
  656: 
  657:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child11, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  658:       }),
  659:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Child11, false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  660:     unlink(Child11),
  661:     exit(Child11, die),
  662:     receive_parallel(
  663:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child11}}],
  664: 
  665:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child11}}],
  666: 
  667:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child11, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  668:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child11, exit, die}}]
  669:       }),
  670: 
  671:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  672:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts2]),
  673:     ok.
  674: 
  675: set_on_first_link(Session, Tracer) ->
  676:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link]),
  677:     Tracee = self(),
  678:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  679:     Child1 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  680:     unlink(Child),
  681:     exit(Child, die),
  682:     unlink(Child1),
  683:     exit(Child1, die),
  684:     receive_parallel(
  685:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  686:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  687:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  688:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  689:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  690:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  691: 
  692:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  693:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  694:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  695:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  696:       }),
  697:     %% Test that spawn on first link works with link/1
  698:     1 = trace:process(Session, Tracee, true, [set_on_first_link]),
  699:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  700:     Child21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  701:     link(Child2),
  702:     link(Child21),
  703:     unlink(Child2),
  704:     unlink(Child21),
  705:     exit(Child2, die),
  706:     exit(Child21,die),
  707:     receive_parallel(
  708:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  709:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,'_'}},
  710:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  711:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}},
  712:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}},
  713:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}}],
  714: 
  715:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  716:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  717:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  718:       }),
  719:     %% Test that spawn on first link flag is not on the child
  720:     1 = trace:process(Session, Tracee, true, [set_on_first_link]),
  721:     Child3 = spawn(fun F() -> receive hej ->
  722:                                       spawn_link(fun()-> receive M -> M end end),
  723:                                       Tracee ! done,
  724:                                       F()
  725:                               end
  726:                    end),
  727:     link(Child3),
  728:     Child3 ! hej,
  729:     receive done -> ok end,
  730:     unlink(Child3),
  731:     exit(Child3, die),
  732:     receive_parallel(
  733:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child3,'_'}},
  734:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child3}},
  735:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child3}}],
  736: 
  737:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  738:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, spawn,'_','_'}},
  739:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, link, '_'}},
  740:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  741:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, exit, die}}]
  742:       }),
  743:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link]),
  744:     ok.
  745: 
  746: set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  747:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts1]),
  748:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts2]),
  749:     Tracee = self(),
  750:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  751:     Child1 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  752:     receive_parallel(
  753:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  754:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  755:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  756:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}}],
  757: 
  758:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  759:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  760:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  761:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}}],
  762: 
  763:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  764:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}}],
  765: 
  766:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  767:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  768:        }),
  769: 
  770:     unlink(Child),
  771:     exit(Child, die),
  772:     unlink(Child1),
  773:     exit(Child1, die),
  774:     receive_parallel(
  775:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  776:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  777: 
  778:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  779:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  780: 
  781:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  782:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  783: 
  784:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  785:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  786:       }),
  787: 
  788:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts1]),
  789:     Child2 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  790:     Child21 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  791:     unlink(Child2),
  792:     exit(Child2, die),
  793:     unlink(Child21),
  794:     exit(Child21, die),
  795:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,_}} = receive_any(),
  796:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}} = receive_any(),
  797:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,_}} = receive_any(),
  798:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}} = receive_any(),
  799:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}} = receive_any(),
  800:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}} = receive_any(),
  801:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts2]),
  802:     ok.
  803: procs(_Config) ->
  804:     Tester= self(),
  805:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  806:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  807:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  808: 
  809:     procs_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
  810: 
  811:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  812:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  813:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  814: 
  815:     procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  816:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  817:     procs_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  818:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  819:     procs_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  820:               legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  821: 
  822:     procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  823:               S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  824:     procs_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  825:               S1, Tracer1, []),
  826: 
  827:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  828:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  829:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  830: 
  831:     unlink(Tracer0),
  832:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  833:     unlink(Tracer1),
  834:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  835:     unlink(Tracer2),
  836:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  837:     ok.
  838: 
  839: procs_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
  840:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts]),
  841: 
  842:     Tracee = self(),
  843:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  844:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  845:     unregister(RegName),
  846:     Child = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  847:     link(Child),
  848:     unlink(Child),
  849:     exit(Child, die),
  850:     receive_parallel(
  851:       {[{Tracer, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  852:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  853:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  854:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  855:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  856: 
  857:        [{Tracer, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  858:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  859:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  860:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}]}),
  861:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts]),
  862: 
  863:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  864:     unregister(RegName),
  865:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  866:     link(Child1),
  867:     unlink(Child1),
  868:     exit(Child1, die),
  869: 
  870:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  871: 
  872:     ok.
  873: procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  874:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  875:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  876: 
  877:     Tracee = self(),
  878:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  879:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  880:     unregister(RegName),
  881:     Child = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  882:     link(Child),
  883:     unlink(Child),
  884:     exit(Child, die),
  885:     receive_parallel(
  886:       {[{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  887:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  888:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  889:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  890:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  891: 
  892:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  893:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  894:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  895:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  896:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  897: 
  898:        [{Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  899:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  900:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  901:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}],
  902: 
  903:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  904:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  905:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  906:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}]
  907:       }),
  908: 
  909:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  910:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  911:     unregister(RegName),
  912:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  913:     link(Child1),
  914:     unlink(Child1),
  915:     exit(Child1, die),
  916:     receive_parallel(
  917:       {[{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  918:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  919:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child1, '_'}},
  920:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  921:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  922: 
  923:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  924:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  925:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  926:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, exit, '_'}}]
  927:       }),
  928: 
  929:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  930:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  931:     unregister(RegName),
  932:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  933:     link(Child2),
  934:     unlink(Child2),
  935:     exit(Child2, die),
  936:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  937:     ok.
  938: 
  939: basic(_Config) ->
  940:     Tester = self(),
  941:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
  942:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
  943:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2",Tester) end),
  944: 
  945:     basic_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
  946: 
  947:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  948:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  949:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  950: 
  951:     basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  952:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  953:     basic_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  954:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  955:     basic_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  956:               legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  957: 
  958:     basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  959:               S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  960:     basic_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  961:               S1, Tracer1, []),
  962: 
  963:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  964:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  965:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  966: 
  967:     unlink(Tracer0),
  968:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  969:     unlink(Tracer1),
  970:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  971:     unlink(Tracer2),
  972:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  973: 
  974:     ok.
  975: 
  976: basic_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
  977:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs | Opts]),
  978: 
  979:     Tracee = self(),
  980:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  981:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  982:     unregister(RegName),
  983: 
  984:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  985:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  986: 
  987:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs | Opts]),
  988: 
  989:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  990:     unregister(RegName),
  991: 
  992:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  993: 
  994:     ok.
  995: 
  996: basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  997:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs | Opts1]),
  998:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs | Opts2]),
  999: 
 1000:     Tracee = self(),
 1001:     RegName = ?MODULE,
 1002:     register(RegName, Tracee),
 1003:     unregister(RegName),
 1004: 
 1005:     receive_unsorted(
 1006:       [{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
 1007:        {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}}]),
 1008:     receive_unsorted(
 1009:       [{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
 1010:        {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}}]),
 1011: 
 1012:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs | Opts1]),
 1013: 
 1014:     register(RegName, Tracee),
 1015:     unregister(RegName),
 1016: 
 1017:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}} = receive_any(),
 1018:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}} = receive_any(),
 1019: 
 1020:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs | Opts2]),
 1021: 
 1022:     register(RegName, Tracee),
 1023:     unregister(RegName),
 1024: 
 1025:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1026: 
 1027:     ok.
 1028: 
 1029: 
 1030: call(_Config) ->
 1031:     Tester = self(),
 1032:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
 1033:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
 1034:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2",Tester) end),
 1035: 
 1036:     call_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
 1037: 
 1038:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
 1039:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
 1040:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
 1041: 
 1042:     [begin
 1043:          io:format("CallType = ~p\n", [CallType]),
 1044:          call_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
 1045:                   S2, Tracer2, [], CallType),
 1046:          call_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
 1047:                   S2, Tracer2, [], CallType),
 1048:          call_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
 1049:                   legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}], CallType),
 1050: 
 1051:          call_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
 1052:                   S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}], CallType),
 1053:          call_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
 1054:                   S1, Tracer1, [], CallType)
 1055:      end
 1056:      || CallType <- [
 1057:                      {[local], fun() -> foo() end},
 1058:                      {[global], fun() -> ?MODULE:foo() end},
 1059:                      {[local], fun() -> ?MODULE:foo() end}]
 1060:     ],
 1061: 
 1062:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
 1063:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
 1064:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
 1065: 
 1066:     unlink(Tracer0),
 1067:     exit(Tracer0, die),
 1068:     unlink(Tracer1),
 1069:     exit(Tracer1, die),
 1070:     unlink(Tracer2),
 1071:     exit(Tracer2, die),
 1072: 
 1073:     ok.
 1074: 
 1075: call_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
 1076:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1077:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1078:     Tracee = self(),
 1079:     1 = erlang:trace(Tracee, true, [call | Opts]),
 1080:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity, true, [local]),
 1081: 
 1082:     foo(),
 1083: 
 1084:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1085: 
 1086:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [call | Opts]),
 1087: 
 1088:     foo(),
 1089:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1090: 
 1091:     ok.
 1092: 
 1093: call_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2, {TPopt, Call}) ->
 1094:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1095:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1096:     Tracee = self(),
 1097:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Tracee, true, [call | Opts1]),
 1098:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, Tracee, true, [call | Opts2]),
 1099: 
 1100:     ?line,
 1101:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1102:     Call(),
 1103:     {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1104:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1105: 
 1106:     ?line,
 1107:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1108:     Call(),
 1109:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1110:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1111:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1112: 
 1113:     ?line,
 1114:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1115:     Call(),
 1116:     {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1117:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1118: 
 1119:     ?line,
 1120:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1121:     Call(),
 1122:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1123:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1124:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1125: 
 1126:     ?line,
 1127:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1128:     Call(),
 1129:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1130:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1131: 
 1132:     ?line,
 1133:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1134:     Call(),
 1135:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1136:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1137:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1138: 
 1139:     ?line,
 1140:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [call | Opts1]),
 1141:     Call(),
 1142:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1143:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1144: 
 1145:     ?line,
 1146:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1147:     Call(),
 1148:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1149: 
 1150:     ?line,
 1151:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1152:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [call | Opts2]),
 1153:     Call(),
 1154:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1155: 
 1156:     ok.
 1157: 
 1158: meta(_Config) ->
 1159:     Tester = self(),
 1160:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
 1161:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
 1162:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
 1163: 
 1164:     meta_do(legacy, Tracer0, S1, Tracer1),
 1165:     meta_do(S1, Tracer1, legacy, Tracer0),
 1166: 
 1167:     unlink(Tracer0),
 1168:     exit(Tracer0, die),
 1169:     unlink(Tracer1),
 1170:     exit(Tracer1, die),
 1171:     ok.
 1172: 
 1173: meta_do(S1, Tracer1, S2, Tracer2) ->
 1174:     Tester = self(),
 1175:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1176:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1177: 
 1178:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, true, [{meta,Tracer1}]),
 1179:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, true, [{meta,Tracer2}]),
 1180: 
 1181:     ?line,
 1182:     foo(),
 1183:     receive_parallel({[{Tracer1, {trace_ts,Tester,call,MFArgs,{'_','_','_'}}}],
 1184:                       [{Tracer2, {trace_ts,Tester,call,MFArgs,{'_','_','_'}}}]}),
 1185: 
 1186:     ?line,
 1187:     ?MODULE:foo(),
 1188:     receive_parallel({[{Tracer1, {trace_ts,Tester,call,MFArgs,{'_','_','_'}}}],
 1189:                       [{Tracer2, {trace_ts,Tester,call,MFArgs,{'_','_','_'}}}]}),
 1190: 
 1191:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, false, [meta]),
 1192: 
 1193:     ?line,
 1194:     foo(),
 1195:     {Tracer2, {trace_ts,Tester,call,MFArgs,{_,_,_}}} = receive_any(),
 1196: 
 1197:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, false, [meta]),
 1198:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1199: 
 1200:     ok.
 1201: 
 1202: destroy(_Config) ->
 1203:     Name = ?MODULE,
 1204:     {_,SName1}=S1 = trace:session_create(Name, self(), []),
 1205: 
 1206:     %% Destroy session with trace_session_destroy
 1207:     destroy_do(SName1, fun() -> trace:session_destroy(S1) end),
 1208: 
 1209:     {_,SName2}=S2 = trace:session_create(Name, self(), []),
 1210: 
 1211:     %% Destroy session with GC (magic bin destructor)
 1212:     put(session, S2),
 1213:     destroy_do(SName2, fun() -> erase(session),
 1214:                                erlang:garbage_collect(),
 1215:                                wait_bp_finish(),
 1216:                                ok
 1217:                       end),
 1218: 
 1219:     ok.
 1220: 
 1221: destroy_do(SName, Destroyer) ->
 1222:     Exp = {?MODULE, exported, 1},
 1223:     Loc = {?MODULE, local, 1},
 1224:     CallMS = [{[arg],[],[]}],
 1225:     SendMS = [{[self(), message],[],[]}],
 1226:     RecvMS = [{[node(), self(), message],[],[]}],
 1227:     [Port|_] = erlang:ports(),
 1228: 
 1229:     1 = trace:function(SName, Exp, CallMS, [global]),
 1230:     1 = trace:function(SName, Loc, CallMS, [local]),
 1231:     0 = trace:function(SName, on_load, CallMS, [local]),
 1232:     1 = trace:send(SName, SendMS, []),
 1233:     1 = trace:recv(SName, RecvMS, []),
 1234:     0 = trace:process(SName, new_processes, true, [all]),
 1235:     0 = trace:port(SName, new_ports, true, [all]),
 1236:     1 = trace:process(SName, self(), true, [procs]),
 1237:     1 = trace:port(SName, Port, true, [ports]),
 1238: 
 1239:     [SName] = trace:session_info(Exp),
 1240:     [SName] = trace:session_info(Loc),
 1241:     [SName] = trace:session_info(on_load),
 1242:     SendSessions1 = trace:session_info(send),
 1243:     true = lists:member(SName, SendSessions1),
 1244:     RecvSessions1 = trace:session_info('receive'),
 1245:     true = lists:member(SName, RecvSessions1),
 1246:     [SName] = trace:session_info(new_processes),
 1247:     [SName] = trace:session_info(new_ports),
 1248:     [SName] = trace:session_info(self()),
 1249:     [SName] = trace:session_info(Port),
 1250: 
 1251:     {traced, global} = trace:info(SName, Exp, traced),
 1252:     {traced, local} = trace:info(SName, Loc, traced),
 1253:     {traced, local} = trace:info(SName, on_load, traced),
 1254:     {match_spec, SendMS} = trace:info(SName, send, match_spec),
 1255:     {match_spec, RecvMS} = trace:info(SName, 'receive', match_spec),
 1256:     {flags, [_|_]} = trace:info(SName, new_processes, flags),
 1257:     {flags, [_|_]} = trace:info(SName, new_ports, flags),
 1258:     {flags, [procs]} = trace:info(SName, self(), flags),
 1259:     {flags, [ports]} = trace:info(SName, Port, flags),
 1260: 
 1261:     Destroyer(),
 1262: 
 1263:     [] = trace:session_info(Exp),
 1264:     [] = trace:session_info(Loc),
 1265:     [] = trace:session_info(on_load),
 1266:     SendSessions2 = trace:session_info(send),
 1267:     false = lists:member(SName, SendSessions2),
 1268:     RecvSessions2 = trace:session_info('receive'),
 1269:     false = lists:member(SName, RecvSessions2),
 1270:     [] = trace:session_info(new_processes),
 1271:     [] = trace:session_info(new_ports),
 1272:     [] = trace:session_info(self()),
 1273:     [] = trace:session_info(Port),
 1274: 
 1275:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, Exp, traced)),
 1276:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, Loc, traced)),
 1277:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, on_load, traced)),
 1278:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, send, match_spec)),
 1279:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, 'receive', match_spec)),
 1280:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, new_processes, flags)),
 1281:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, new_ports, flags)),
 1282:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, self(), flags)),
 1283:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, Port, flags)),
 1284:     true.
 1285: 
 1286: negative(_Config) ->
 1287:     Tracee = spawn_link(fun() -> receive done -> ok end end),
 1288:     SessionTracer = spawn_link(fun() -> receive done -> ok end end),
 1289:     OtherTracer = spawn_link(fun() -> receive done -> ok end end),
 1290:     MFA = {?MODULE, foo, 0},
 1291:     S = trace:session_create(?MODULE, SessionTracer, []),
 1292: 
 1293:     %% Specified tracer not allowed
 1294:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:process(S, Tracee, true, [call, {tracer,OtherTracer}])),
 1295:     1 = catch trace:process(S, Tracee, true, [call]),
 1296:     1 = catch trace:process(S, Tracee, false, [call]),
 1297: 
 1298:     %% Specified meta tracer not allowed
 1299:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:function(S, MFA, true, [{meta,OtherTracer}])),
 1300:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:function(S, MFA, true, [{meta,erl_tracer,OtherTracer}])),
 1301:     1 = trace:function(S, MFA, true, [meta]),
 1302:     1 = trace:function(S, MFA, false, [meta]),
 1303: 
 1304:     FuncInfoItems = [all, traced, match_spec, meta, meta_match_spec,
 1305:                      call_count, call_time, call_memory],
 1306:     [{Item,undefined} = trace:info(S, {?MODULE, false, 77}, Item)
 1307:      || Item <- FuncInfoItems],
 1308:     [{Item,false} = trace:info(S, MFA, Item)
 1309:      || Item <- FuncInfoItems],
 1310: 
 1311:     trace:session_destroy(S),
 1312:     ok.
 1313: 
 1314: %% Test error reporting of module 'trace'.
 1315: error_info(_Config) ->
 1316:     %% Pick up external pid and port.
 1317:     {ok, Peer, ExternalNode} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1318:     ExternalPid = rpc:call(ExternalNode, erlang, whereis, [code_server]),
 1319:     ExternalPort = hd(rpc:call(ExternalNode, erlang, ports, [])),
 1320:     Tracer = spawn(fun() -> receive never -> false end end),
 1321:     TraceSession = trace:session_create(?MODULE, Tracer, []),
 1322: 
 1323:     L = [
 1324:          {process, [TraceSession, a, true, []]},
 1325:          {process, [TraceSession, ExternalPid, true, []]},
 1326:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), not_boolean, []]},
 1327:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), true, bad_flags]},
 1328:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), true, [bad_flag]]},
 1329:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), true, [call|send]]},
 1330: 
 1331:          {port, [TraceSession, a, true, []]},
 1332:          {port, [TraceSession, ExternalPort, true, []]},
 1333:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), not_boolean, []]},
 1334:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), true, bad_flags]},
 1335:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), true, [bad_flag]]},
 1336:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), true, [send|'receive']]},
 1337: 
 1338: 
 1339:          {function, [TraceSession, a, true, []]},
 1340:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, not_boolean, []]},
 1341:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, bad_flags]},
 1342:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [bad_flag]]},
 1343:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [local|meta]]},
 1344:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, [{[self(), '_'],[],[]}], [call_count]]},
 1345: 
 1346:          {send, [TraceSession, a, []]},
 1347:          {send, [TraceSession, true, bad_flags]},
 1348:          {send, [TraceSession, true, [bad_flag]]},
 1349: 
 1350:          {recv, [TraceSession, a, []]},
 1351:          {recv, [TraceSession, true, bad_flags]},
 1352:          {recv, [TraceSession, true, [bad_flag]]},
 1353: 
 1354:          {info, [bad_session, self(), flags]},
 1355:          {info, [make_ref(), self(), flags]},
 1356:          {info, [atomics:new(1,[]), self(), flags]},
 1357:          {info, [TraceSession, ExternalPid, flags]},
 1358:          {info, [TraceSession, self(), bad_item]},
 1359: 
 1360:          {session_create, ["bad name", self(), []]},
 1361:          {session_create, [name, bad_tracer, []]},
 1362:          {session_create, [name, self(), bad_option]},
 1363:          {session_create, [name, self(), [bad_option]]},
 1364: 
 1365:          {session_destroy, [bad_session]},
 1366:          {session_destroy, [make_ref()]},
 1367:          {session_destroy, [atomics:new(1,[])]},
 1368: 
 1369:          {session_info, [ExternalPid]},
 1370: 
 1371:          {delivered, 2} %% Cannot fail
 1372:         ],
 1373: 
 1374:     try
 1375:         error_info_lib:test_error_info(trace, L, [allow_nyi])
 1376:     after
 1377:         peer:stop(Peer)
 1378:     end.
 1379: 
 1380: 
 1381: wait_bp_finish() ->
 1382:     wait_thread_progress(5).
 1383: 
 1384: wait_thread_progress(0) -> ok;
 1385: wait_thread_progress(N) ->
 1386:     ok = erts_debug:set_internal_state(wait, thread_progress),
 1387:     wait_thread_progress(N-1).
 1388: 
 1389: foo() ->
 1390:     ok.
 1391: 
 1392: exported(X) ->
 1393:     local(X).
 1394: 
 1395: local(_) ->
 1396:     ok.
 1397: 
 1398: tracer(Name, Tester) ->
 1399:     receive M ->
 1400:             io:format("~p ~p got message: ~p\n", [Name, self(), M]),
 1401:             Tester ! {self(), M}
 1402:     end,
 1403:     tracer(Name, Tester).
 1404: 
 1405: 
 1406: receive_any() ->
 1407:     receive_any(1000).
 1408: 
 1409: receive_any(Timeout) ->
 1410:     receive M -> M
 1411:     after Timeout -> timeout
 1412:     end.
 1413: 
 1414: receive_nothing() ->
 1415:     receive_any(10).
 1416: 
 1417: %% Argument is a tuple of lists with expected messages to receive.
 1418: %% Each list is internally ordered according to expected reception.
 1419: %% The different lists in the tuple are mutually unordered.
 1420: %% '_' can be used as wildcard in message terms.
 1421: receive_parallel({}) ->
 1422:     ok;
 1423: receive_parallel(Tuple) ->
 1424:     M = receive_any(),
 1425:     receive_parallel(M, Tuple, tuple_size(Tuple)).
 1426: 
 1427: receive_parallel(M, Tuple, I) when I > 0 ->
 1428:     [Pattern|Tail] = element(I, Tuple),
 1429:     case {match(Pattern, M), Tail} of
 1430:         {true, []} ->
 1431:             receive_parallel(erlang:delete_element(I, Tuple));
 1432:         {true, _} ->
 1433:             receive_parallel(setelement(I, Tuple, Tail));
 1434:         {false, _} ->
 1435:             receive_parallel(M, Tuple, I-1)
 1436:     end;
 1437: receive_parallel(M, Tuple, 0) ->
 1438:     Failed = [H || [H|_] <- tuple_to_list(Tuple)],
 1439:     io:format("Expected any of:\n~p\n", [Failed]),
 1440:     io:format("Got message:\n~p\n", [M]),
 1441:     ct:fail("Unexpected messages: ~p", [M]).
 1442: 
 1443: 
 1444: receive_unsorted(Expect) ->
 1445:     receive_unsorted(Expect, length(Expect)).
 1446: 
 1447: receive_unsorted(Expect0, Cnt) when Cnt > 0 ->
 1448:     M = receive_any(),
 1449:     Expect1 = match_and_delete(M, Expect0, []),
 1450:     receive_unsorted(Expect1, Cnt-1);
 1451: receive_unsorted(_, 0) ->
 1452:     ok.
 1453: 
 1454: match_and_delete(M, [Pattern | Tail], Failed) ->
 1455:     case match(Pattern, M) of
 1456:         true -> Failed ++ Tail;
 1457:         false ->
 1458:             match_and_delete(M, Tail, [Pattern | Failed])
 1459:     end;
 1460: match_and_delete(M, [], Failed) ->
 1461:     io:format("Expected any of:\n~p\n", [Failed]),
 1462:     io:format("Got message:\n~p\n", [M]),
 1463:     ct:fail("Unexpected messages: ~p", [M]).
 1464: 
 1465: 
 1466: 
 1467: match(A, A) -> true;
 1468: match('_', _) -> true;
 1469: match([Ah|At], [Bh|Bt]) ->
 1470:     match(Ah, Bh) andalso match(At, Bt);
 1471: match(A, B) when tuple_size(A) =:= tuple_size(B) ->
 1472:     match(tuple_to_list(A), tuple_to_list(B));
 1473: match(_A, _B) ->
 1474:     false.
 1475: 
 1476: 
 1477: end_of_list(_Config) ->
 1478:     ok.
